entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
